text: Allahe ka’le, ‘(thika ache) anatipalame ami tomara bhatrra dbaraa tomara bahuka saktisali karaima arau tomaloka ubhayake praadhan'ya dana karaima. Phalata sihamte tomalokara ocarata paumciba noraaraiba. Amara nidarsanaralira dbaraa tomaloka arau tomalokara anusaraisakale sihamtara oparata bijaya labha karaiba’
